ThingDef.label: advanced fission reactor
ThingDef.description: A micro-fission reactor that can only be installed in personae. This particular reactor does not require any fuel as it is capable of self sustainment - however since it hasn't been made inside a mech-casket it lacks certain fail-safes, and can randomly overclock to maintain its stability, causing magnetic instability.

ThingDef.label: mechanoid visual sensor
ThingDef.description: A mechanoid grade wide-spectrum sensor that can only be installed in personae. These sensors have the appearance of a pitch black pearl, once installed they can detect movement at extreme distances; perceive light, infrared, and gamma rays. It is also capable of detecting heat signatures.

ThingDef.label: advanced repair nexus
ThingDef.description: A small reactor dedicated to releasing bursts of energy to alleviate the energy strain of repairs - it can only be installed in personae.
